      • moveForward

        public void moveForward(Piece piece,
               int nbDeplacement,
               boolean moveStairway)
                 throws PathBlockedException
        Move a Pieceforward. If the piece is in a HorsePen move the Piece to its starting Square. If another Piece is already on it, check its team and either kill him if it's from another Team or throw a PathBlockedException if it's from the Piece's Team
        Parameters:
        piece -
        nbDeplacement -
        moveStairway -
        Throws:
        PathBlockedException

      • moveFromHorsPen

        public void moveFromHorsPen(Piece piece,
                   Square pieceSquare,
                   Square startSquare)
                     throws PathBlockedException
        Move a Piece from its HorsePen. If a enemy Piece is on the startSquare it kills it. If one of your Team's Piece is on the startSquare it throws a PathBlockedException.
        Parameters:
        piece -
        pieceSquare -
        startSquare -
        Throws:
        PathBlockedException

      • killPiece

        public void killPiece(Piece killer,
             Piece killed)
        Kills a Piece. The killer Piece takes it place and the killed Piece goes back to its startingSquare.
        Parameters:
        killer -
        killed -
